data.field: time - return number of seconds since 1970

Returns the number of non-leap seconds since whatever time the system considers to be the epoch (that's 00:00:00, January 1, 1904 for MacOS, and 00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970 for most other systems). Suitable for feeding to [perlfunc:gmtime|gmtime()] and [perlfunc:localtime|localtime()].
